dict.acceptation: 浓缩，（使）浓缩；[采矿]汰选；选矿，精选，富集；
集中起来的，经过浓缩的；

sent.orig: From-concentrate juice has been reconstituted from concentrate and pasteurized before packaging.
sent.trans: 经过浓缩的果汁在包装前要对水还原，并消毒。

sent.orig: Don't have one man that will only concentrate on you, which concentrate one, never are yours.
sent.trans: 没有男人会永远对你专一的，专一的那一位，不会是你要的。

sent.orig: I think that we must concentrate on economic work for a long time to come.
sent.trans: 不只是当前，恐怕今后长期的工作重点都要放在经济工作上面。

sent.orig: Concentrate the natural elite, Dedicate to the Human Health.
sent.trans: 浓缩植物精华，缔造人类健康！

sent.orig: He needs to concentrate.Don't distract his mind from his studies.
sent.trans: 他需要集中精力。别打搅他的学习。
